archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Off-Board Party Product Offering
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Off-board a party's product offering. This can occur when an agreement or an item on an agreement associated with a product offering is terminated.

properties.value: Off-Board Party Product Offering off-boards a party's product offering. This can occur when an agreement or an item on an agreement associated with a product offering is terminated. When the final product offering related to a product specification is off-boarded the product specification may also be off-boarded by the Off-Board Party Product Specification process. Note that this process will interact with the Manage Product Offering Exit process which is part of Product Offering Development & Retirement.
